title: Pretty
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I see you in my dreams
This life is pretty
[Chorus]
Talk to me

Tell me any story

See me

You don't have to be alone



[Verse 2]

We sat on cold concrete

I could only stare at my feet when you said

You felt close to me



[Verse 3]

Transfixed on lullabies

I'm suspended when I find myself needing you



[Chorus]
